newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Cadence estimates raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Cadence estimates raised.

text.p: Robertson, Stephens & Co analyst Jennifer Smith raised her estimates for Cadence Design Systems based on cost cutting measures taken at the company now that its acquisitions and reorganizations have been completed.
-- raised her second quarter 1997 estimate to $0.40 per share from $0.38 and full year 1997 to $1.75 a share from $1.73. She raised full year 1998 to $2.12 a share from $2.11.
-- reiterated a buy rating on the stock. maintained a 12-month price target of $50 to $51 a share.
-- Cadence shares were up 13/16 at 38-3/8 by midday.
